thread.section_title: Optima Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optima Tax Relief | optimataxrelief.com
thread.title: Patricia Reimbold
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Patricia Reimbold

author: Patricia Reimbold
title: Patricia Reimbold
text: I was very impressed with all the staff at Optima Tax Relief from the receptionists, case managers, and my tax preparer. All were very respectful and professional. The peace of mind that they gave me knowing my taxes were being prepared was priceless. They negotiated penalties for me and my outcome was fantastic! I will definitely refer everyone I know who needs tax assistance to them.
